page.description: Get the field associated with the control.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.FIELD_GET() Syntax &ltFIELD> as P = &ltOBJECT>.FIELD_GET() Description The &ltOBJECT>.FIELD_GET() method applies to:
Form Controls (for &ltOBJECT> use the &ltCONTROL> pointer or the address of the control) The &ltOBJECT>.FIELD_GET() method returns a pointer to the table field that is bound to the control. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example dim frm as P dim fld as P dim tblfld as P frm = form.load("Customer Information") fld = frm.child("Lastname") tblfld = fld.Field_Get() ? tblfld.fullname_get() -> "CUSTOMER->LASTNAME"
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
